page.title: 17CREST HOTEL, LANGLEY GREEN
page.content: On a visit to the{Crest Hotel, Gatwick {Airport}(not actually at the airport!) the pupils were shown around. "We went to the{laundry.} They had 7 ladies and they had to wash 600 sheets a day. We went past all the{offices. There were about 20. In a{bedroom there was a colour TV, video, tea and coffee maker, trouser press and private bathroom. In the{Executive {Suite}there was a really posh jacuzzi. On the way to the{restaurant}we found an automatic shoe polisher. We also visited the{Bridge Bar}(for non- alcoholic drinks!)." {Crest Hotel}was the first, and now the largest 3-star, Gatwick hotel:{230 beds,{159}staff, including 11 chefs. In theory{177268}guests could be accomodated a year. Guests come from all over the world: USA,Canada,Uganda and Philippines, for example.
